Series.Actors: |Thomas Middleditch|T.J. Miller|Zach Woods|Kumail Nanjiani|Matt Ross|Amanda Crew|Christopher Evan Welch|Josh Brener|Martin Starr|
Series.Overview: In the high-tech gold rush of modern Silicon Valley, the people most qualified to succeed are the least capable of handling success. A comedy partially inspired by Mike Judge's own experiences as a Silicon Valley engineer in the late 1980s.
